title: Guidelines on what to do during an Armed Robbery of a Pharmacy (GDNA - Georgia ...
text: ( Source : GDNA - Georgia Drugs and Narcotics Agency ) Due to the recent increase in pharmacy armed robberies, we have been asked to provide guidelines to pharmacists to help them know what to do in case their pharmacy is robbed. These are
